episodes.title: Is the Mormon Church a Cult? Two Famous Aussies Say So!
episodes.description:
Breaking this week! An explosive submission to the Victorian Parliamentary Inquiry into cults alleges the Mormon Church is operating as a cult on Australian soil. The Australian Post-Mormon Community claims the institution engages in deceptive recruitment, amasses staggering wealth through mandatory tithing, and lacks financial transparency. 

The submission details alleged harms, including the abusive missionary system and intrusive private interviews with children and youth. Former members, prepared to offer oral testimony, urge the Victorian government to implement sweeping legal reforms and create a regulatory body to curb the institutional power and abuses.

Want to create live streams like this? Check out StreamYard: https://streamyard.com/pal/d/5723041630912512
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
